suwasariya diwayinama aawaranaya karayi | dinamina niwasa suwasariya diwayinama aawaranaya karayi suwasariya diwayinama aawaranaya karayi shri lankawe purwa rohal hadisi prathikara sewawa wiplawiya mawathakata awathirna kala 1990 suwasariya gilanratha sewawa ehi nirmathru, aarthika prathisanskarana saha podu sapayim amathi aacharya harsha da silwa mahathage pradhanathwayen eeye (23) samastha shri lankawama aawaranaya kirime aithihasika awasthawa ampara nagarayedi sanituhan kaleya.
